General.Name: Kerur Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Kerur Holdings Ltd., through its subsidiaries, operates in the food sector in Israel. It produces and markets soft drinks and mineral water; and frozen potato and onion fries, as well as plant products. The company was formerly known as The Israeli Company Cooling & Supply Co. Ltd. and changed its name to Kerur Holdings Ltd. in 2006. The company was incorporated in 1929 and is based in Or Yehuda, Israel. Kerur Holdings Ltd. is a subsidiary of Israeli Shipping and Supply Company Ltd.
